body.raw:
I have been a software developer for over 18 years, using .NET Framework, .NET Core and .NET platform.
I have a strong background in creating dedicated software.
I also have much experience in Azure and Terraform.
Since satisfied clients are the best motivation for me, I always incorporate my top programming skills into every project I work on.
I always try to help the team, create a fair and efficient work atmosphere, and care about the details.

body.raw:
I have been a software developer for over 15 years, using .NET platform. I have a strong background in creating software dedicated to financial services. I also have a lot of experience in cloud-native development using Azure. For over three years, I have also been a team leader for a group of .NET developers. Nowadays, I specialize in DevOps practices as well as the Infrastructure as Code approach using Terraform.
I always try to be helpful to the team, create a good and efficient work atmosphere, and care about the details.
